item.title: Web Scraping RStudio Cheatsheets
item.description: My work sits at the confluence of statistics, data science, and public policy. Though its fashionable to call oneself a ‘data scientist’ these days, a data scientist I am not. I DO, however, use many of the tools, techniques, and processes of a data scientist.
